title: Ep 2. Talking with Hannah Clement, Group Head of Civic Infrastructure at Development Victoria
excerpt: This week’s episode we have Hannah Clement who is the group head of Civic Infrastructure at Development Victoria; currently overseeing the team delivering the $1 Billion, Melbourne Arts Precinct.
author: Building Environs

sections.heading: Ep 2. Talking with Hannah Clement, Group Head of Civic Infrastructure at Development Victoria

sections.content: This week’s episode we have +[Hannah Clement](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hannah-clement-a940879/)+ who is the group head of Civic Infrastructure at +[Development Victoria](https://www.development.vic.gov.au/projects?view=list)+; currently overseeing the team delivering the $1 Billion, +[Melbourne Arts Precinct](https://artsprecinct.melbourne/)+.

Hannah has already had an enviable career. Setting out as an Engineer, she successfully transitioned into Project Management and has, for the last 10 years or so, been back in Melbourne delivering some of our most well-known civil projects.
Her experience spans projects in Abu Dhabi and Vietnam as well as here in Melbourne, where she has been a part of some of our most recognisable building projects, including:

items: Al Habel Al Abyad Island, including the Abu Dhabi F1 race track.

sections.title: Ep 2. Talking with Hannah Clement, Group Head of Civic Infrastructure at Development Victoria
